items.summary: Fix the Awards & Recognition section on the About page (frontend/src/pages/About.tsx) so that all 7 award photos (award-photo-01.jpeg, award-photo-02.jpeg, award-photo-04.jpeg, award-photo-05.jpeg, award-photo-06.jpeg, award-photo-07.jpeg, award-photo-08.jpeg) render visibly. Completely rewrite the awards rendering block: remove all dynamic/template-literal src construction, inline event handlers, lazy loading, and conditional rendering. Each must use a fully hardcoded literal src string (e.g. src='/assets/generated/award-photo-01.jpeg'), className='w-full h-48 object-cover rounded-lg', and must be wrapped in a div with className='w-full overflow-hidden rounded-lg bg-gray-100'. Do not reference award-photo-03.jpeg anywhere.

Fix the Awards & Recognition sub-section on the Home page (frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx) so that all 7 award photos (award-photo-01.jpeg, award-photo-02.jpeg, award-photo-04.jpeg, award-photo-05.jpeg, award-photo-06.jpeg, award-photo-07.jpeg, award-photo-08.jpeg) render visibly. Completely rewrite the awards rendering block: remove all dynamic/template-literal src construction, inline event handlers, lazy loading, and conditional rendering. Each must use a fully hardcoded literal src string (e.g. src='/assets/generated/award-photo-01.jpeg'), className='w-full h-48 object-cover rounded-lg', and must be wrapped in a div with className='w-full overflow-hidden rounded-lg bg-gray-100'. Do not reference award-photo-03.jpeg anywhere. All other founder section content (profile photo, name, roles, motto, Books by Our Founder) must remain intact.
